attributes.action: Evict all MP's immeadiately from the House of Commons who have been found to have falsely claimed expences, but intend to stand down at the next election , they will of course lose any wages, or resettlement grant in the process.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All MP's who have been found to have falsly claimed and been paid expences, should be fired from their jobs immeadiately and forego any renumeration, or resettlement grant  even if they intend standing down at the next election.

rejection.details: The PM does not control who sits in Parliament. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
